name: aerialist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who entertains people by doing difficult and skilful physical acts high above the ground, for example on a high wire or a trapeze (= a short bar hanging from two ropes): The aerialists performed a breathtaking show above our heads. The famous aerialist walked from one tower of the building to the other.
More examplesFewer examplesThe troupe of clowns, aerialists, and acrobats put on more than a hundred shows every year.The aerialists worked on a series of nets, trapezes and swings.She started as a dancer and later became an aerialist. The aerialists were pretty impressive, but the rest of the show was quite boring.
